courses.title: CS 1110 - Introduction to Computing Using Python
courses.description: This course is designed for students with no prior programming experience.

courses.title: CS 2110 - Object-Oriented Programming and Data Structures
topics: Data structures like lists, trees, and hash tables
courses.description: This course covers intermediate programming concepts and data structure implementation.

courses.title: CS 2800 - Mathematical Foundations of Computer Science
courses.description: Covers mathematical foundations with applications in various areas of computer science.

courses.title: CS 3110 - Data Structures and Functional Programming
courses.description: This course emphasizes functional programming techniques and advanced data structures.

courses.title: CS 3410 - Computer System Organization and Programming
courses.description: This course covers the organization of computer systems and systems programming.

courses.title: CS 4410 - Operating Systems
courses.description: This course introduces the design of systems programs with an emphasis on multiprogrammed operating systems.

courses.title: CS 3700 - Foundations of AI
courses.description: This course focuses on hands-on AI problem solving, covering various foundational topics.

courses.title: CS 3780 - Introduction to Machine Learning
courses.description: This course focuses on supervised learning and real-world applications.

courses.title: CS 2112 - Object-Oriented Design and Data Structures - Honors
courses.description: An in-depth study of software design and data structures, focusing on complex problem solving.

courses.title: CS 3420 - Introduction to Embedded Systems Design
courses.description: This course covers embedded systems design and programming.

courses.title: CS 4110 - Programming Languages and Logics
courses.description: This course covers the theory, design, and implementation of programming languages.

courses.title: CS 4120 - Modern Compilers
courses.description: This course introduces the specification and implementation of modern compilers.

courses.title: CS 4121 - Practicum in Compilers
courses.description: This practicum focuses on the hands-on implementation of a compiler for an object-oriented language.

courses.title: CS 4152 - Advanced Topics in Computer Game Architecture
courses.description: This course explores the architecture and design of complex game systems.

courses.title: CS 4210 - Numerical Analysis and Differential Equations
courses.description: This course introduces numerical methods for solving differential equations.

courses.title: CS 4411 - Operating Systems Practicum
courses.description: This practicum focuses on the practical aspects of operating systems through the design and implementation of an OS kernel.

courses.title: CS 4420 - Advanced Computer Architecture
courses.description: This course covers advanced computer architecture and design principles.

courses.title: CS 4450 - Computer Networking
courses.description: This course introduces the basic architectural and design principles of computer networking.

courses.title: CS 4620 - Introduction to Computer Graphics
courses.description: This course covers the principles of computer graphics in 2D and 3D.

courses.title: CS 4621 - Computer Graphics Practicum
courses.description: This practicum provides hands-on experience in computer graphics programming on modern hardware.

courses.title: CS 4411 - Operating Systems Practicum
courses.description: This practicum focuses on the practical aspects of operating systems through the design and implementation of an OS kernel.

courses.title: CS 4420 - Advanced Computer Architecture
courses.description: This course covers advanced computer architecture and design principles.

courses.title: CS 4450 - Computer Networking
courses.description: This course introduces the basic architectural and design principles of computer networking.

courses.title: CS 4620 - Introduction to Computer Graphics
courses.description: This course covers the principles of computer graphics in 2D and 3D.

courses.title: CS 4621 - Computer Graphics Practicum
courses.description: This practicum provides hands-on experience in computer graphics programming on modern hardware.

courses.title: CS 4670 - Introduction to Computer Vision
courses.description: This course provides an in-depth introduction to computer vision, with emphasis on hands-on projects.

courses.title: CS 4701 - Practicum in Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: This AI project class allows students to choose topics like knowledge representation, machine learning, or NLP, requiring a substantial weekly time commitment.

courses.title: CS 4740 - Natural Language Processing
courses.description: This course covers machine translation, question answering, and conversational assistants, with substantial programming assignments.

courses.title: CS 4782 - Introduction to Deep Learning
courses.description: This course provides an introduction to deep learning, covering principles and ethical implications.

courses.title: CS 4789 - Introduction to Reinforcement Learning
courses.description: This course introduces reinforcement learning and Markov Decision Processes, with hands-on algorithm implementation.

courses.title: CS 4820 - Introduction to Analysis of Algorithms
courses.description: This course develops techniques for algorithm design and analysis, focusing on problems in systems, AI, and data mining.

courses.title: CS 4220 - Numerical Analysis: Linear and Nonlinear Problems
courses.description: This course covers numerical methods for solving linear and nonlinear problems, with a focus on matrix operations and optimization.

courses.title: CS 4300 - Language and Information
courses.description: This course explores the intersection of natural language processing and information retrieval, focusing on language models and search algorithms.

courses.title: CS 4120 - Modern Compilers
courses.description: This course introduces the specification and implementation of compilers, covering topics like lexical scanning, parsing, and optimization.
